text: The 2018 Russian Women's Football Championship (Russian: Чемпионат России по футболу среди женщин 2018) is the 27th Russian Women's Football Championship season. It is being played from 21 April 2018 to 23 October 2018. The defending champions are Zvezda Perm. == Table == Team Qualification or relegation 1 Ryazan-VDV 9 7 1 1 16 2 +14 22 Champions League Round of 32 2 CSKA Moscow 8 5 3 0 14 4 +10 18 Champions League Round of 32 3 Zvezda Perm 9 5 1 3 14 9 +5 16 4 Chertanovo Moscow 8 5 1 2 13 8 +5 16 5 Kubanochka Krasnodar 8 3 0 5 7 9 −2 9 6 Lokomotiv Moscow 8 2 3 3 7 4 +3 9 7 Yenisey Krasnoyarsk 8 1 1 6 6 14 −8 4 8 Torpedo Izhevsk 8 0 0 8 0 27 −27 0 == Results == == Statistics == === Top scorers === 7 goals * Elena Danilova (Ryazan-VDV) 6 goals * Nelli Korovkina (Chertanovo Moscow) 4 goals * Nadezhda Smirnova (CSKA Moscow) * Olesya Kurochkina (Zvezda Perm) == References == Category:Football competitions in Europe
title: 2018 Russian Women's Football Championship
